title: F-cking Special #2
description: Brent believes he’s cursed and he won’t stop until he knows the truth.In this follow up to the cult classic, we rejoin Shane, Brent, and Dennis as they venture off to a small town that nobody cares about. The already dynamic cast is joined by Miranda, a drag queen with carnival roots, on the road. From the walking dead to a seedy motel, all the strangeness fans have grown to love come crawling back to the pages. And we finding ourselves catching up with Alton and the secret in his closet.This horror thriller is the second in "F-cking Special" series.
author: Tyson Anthony
